content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have direct access to your Instagram account or any other personal data. I'm a text-based AI assistant, and I don't have the capability to retrieve or display visual data like graphs.

But I can offer some suggestions to help you track your Instagram engagement:

1. **Instagram Insights**: If you have an Instagram business account, you can use Instagram Insights to track your engagement metrics, such as likes, comments, saves, and more. Insights provide a detailed breakdown of your account's performance over time.
2. **Third-party analytics tools**: There are many third-party analytics tools available that can help you track your Instagram engagement. Some popular options include Hootsuite, Sprout Social, and Iconosquare. These tools can provide you with detailed reports and graphs to help you visualize your engagement metrics.
3. **Manual tracking**: You can also track your engagement metrics manually by taking note of your likes, comments, and other engagement metrics for each post. You can use a spreadsheet or a note-taking app to record your data and create your own graphs.

If you need help with setting up Instagram Insights or finding a third-party analytics tool, I'd be happy to provide more information and guidance!
